entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4 except temperature falling to minus 7 near the Trans-Canada Highway.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4 except temperature falling to minus 7 near the Trans-Canada Highway. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Clear. Temperature steady near minus 8.
